thread.title: Google names CEO of self-driving car division
thread.title_full: Google names CEO of self-driving car division

title: Google names CEO of self-driving car division
text:
Google names CEO of self-driving car division John Krafcik has extensive auto industry experience POSTED: 07:34 AM CDT Sep 14, 2015 UPDATED: 08:12 AM CDT Sep 14, 2015 Justin Sullivan/Getty Images MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. - 
Google has named John Krafcik as CEO of its Self-Driving Car Project, according to multiple media outlets including The Wall Street Journal, USA Today, and The Detroit Free Press. Related Content Google to kill single most annoying thing about browsing... 
According to The Wall Street Journal, Krafcik has experience working for automakers Ford and Hyundai. 
Krafcik has been the president of TrueCar, Inc., an online car purchasing service, since last year, according to autonews.com. 
USA Today reports Krafcik started working in the auto industry in 1984. 
Googleâ€™s goal is to have driverless cars on the roads within five years, according to the Detroit Free Press.
